features: Sync Single Jira Issue to Google Doc
Link Jira Issue to Specific Google Doc
Create New Google Doc from Extension

architecture.backend: Google Apps Script / Direct REST API (Client-side)

known_limitations: Epic Bulk Sync relies on active session cookies to fetch child data (Fragile)
DOM Scraping used for data extraction (Subject to breakage on Jira UI updates)
No server-side database; all mapping is local to the user's browser extension storage

test_coverage.status: Infrastructure present, tests exist for Parsers and Sync Services
